contract

Class Contract

  • java.lang.Object
    • contract.Contract
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    StandardContract, VipContract

    public abstract class Contract
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Contract of the antiquary
    Author:
    David Nevado Catalan, Jorge Arellano Subias
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      Checks if the contract provides a free auction for the user

    • Constructor Detail

      • Contract

        public Contract()
        Constructor of a generic contract. It sets the Expiration date to one year from the moment the contract is created

    • Method Detail

      • freeAuction

        public abstract boolean freeAuction()
        Checks if the contract provides a free auction for the user
        Returns:
        true if the contracts provides a free auction false if it does not.

      • applyDiscount

        public double applyDiscount(Item item)
        Applies the appropriate discount to an item
        Parameters:
        item - Item which discounted price we want to obtain
        Returns:
        Discounted price of item.

      • applyDeliveryDiscount

        public double applyDeliveryDiscount(Item item)
        Calculates the final delivery cost of an item applying the appropriate discount offered by the contract
        Parameters:
        item - Item which discounted delivery cost we want to obtain
        Returns:
        Discounted delivery cost of the item

      • getEndDate

        public java.time.LocalDate getEndDate()
        Get the date of expiration of the contract
        Returns:
        The date in which the contract expires

      • increaseAmount

        public abstract void increaseAmount(double amount)
                             throws InvalidArgumentsException
        Increases the amount of money spent by the customer with the contract. The generic contract doesn't keep track of the spentAmount so it does nothing.
        Parameters:
        amount - Amount spent in Euros
        Throws:
        InvalidArgumentsException - when receives a negative amount
